product_name: ASUS ROG Strix 1000G 1000W 80 Plus Gold Power Supply

descriptions.title: ASUS ROG Strix 1000G 1000W 80 Plus Gold Power Supply
descriptions.details: The ASUS ROG Strix 1000G 80 Plus Gold Power Supply brings premium cooling performance to heavyweight gaming rigs. This PSU features a dual ball bearing setup that will last up to twice as long as a sleeve bearing design. ROG heat-sinks cover critical components. Lower temps result in a longer lifespan and reduced noise. The Power supply comes with an onboard controller that brings the 135mm fan to a standstill when total draw power (TDP) is below 40%, letting you enjoy light gaming in relative silence. Above 40% TDP, the fans automatically start up again. The integrated ROG heat-sinks have 2x more volume than traditional designs, resulting in significantly lower temperatures inside Strix PSUs. This extends the lifespan of components and allows 0dB operation for a longer duration than standard designs. ASUS ROG Strix 1000G 1000W 80 Plus Gold Power Supply's heat-sinks are so effective that fan noise stays whisper quiet, even under full load. Axial-tech fan design features a smaller fan hub that facilitates longer blades and a barrier ring that increases downward air pressure. It supports cosmetic customization that is enabled by a magnetic logo and stickers that help you re-skin the visible side to your liking.  It has earned an 80 Plus Gold Certification as the result of Japanese capacitors and other premium components. It ensures reliability and comes with a 10-year warranty.

product_name: NZXT C1200 80 Plus Gold Full Modular 1200 Watt Power Supply

descriptions.title: NZXT C1200 80 Plus Gold Full Modular 1200 Watt Power Supply
descriptions.details: The NZXT C1200 80 Plus Gold Full Modular 1200 Watt Power Supply – a powerful and efficient solution for delivering reliable and consistent power to your high-performance gaming and computing systems. Designed to adhere to the ATX v3.0 power standard, this PSU brings top-notch performance and features that cater to the needs of demanding users. With its remarkable 16-pin PCIe 12VHPWR connector, the NZXT C1200 Gold can deliver an impressive 600 watts of power to NVIDIA 40-series graphics cards using just a single cable. This capability ensures that your graphics-intensive applications and games receive the power they need to run at peak performance without any bottlenecks. NZXT has gone above and beyond to guarantee that their C1200 power supply meets the highest standards of quality and reliability. Each unit is built and thoroughly tested, ensuring trouble-free installation and optimal operation. This meticulous approach gives users the peace of mind that their power supply can withstand heavy loads and extended usage without faltering. The NZXT C1200 Gold boasts an exceptional 90.5% efficiency peak at 50% load, resulting in reduced temperatures, energy consumption, and noise levels. This high efficiency not only saves power but also aids in keeping the overall system cooler during intense tasks, leading to improved performance and system stability. For those seeking a quieter computing experience, the Zero Fan Mode of the NZXT C1200 is a game-changer. When the power supply is operating under light loads, the fan automatically stops, minimizing system noise and creating a more serene computing environment. The power supply features a 135mm PWM fan with a fluid dynamic bearing, designed to offer whisper-quiet operation and a long lifespan. This combination of quietness and longevity ensures that your power supply will serve you reliably for years to come. The NZXT C1200 is constructed using high-quality Japanese 105°C capacitors, known for their durability and ability to handle prolonged usage under demanding conditions. These premium components contribute to the overall reliability and performance of the power supply, making it an excellent choice for enthusiasts and professionals alike. The NZXT C1200 80 Plus Gold Full Modular 1200 Watt Power Supply is a top-tier option for power-hungry systems, especially those equipped with high-end NVIDIA 40-series graphics cards. Its full modularity allows for clean cable management, and its high efficiency, quiet operation, and stringent quality standards make it a standout choice for users who prioritize performance, reliability, and noise reduction.

descriptions.title: Corsair HX1500i 1500W 80+ Platinum Full-Modular ATX Power Supply
descriptions.details: The Corsair HXi Series Fully Modular Power Supply is Ultra-Low Noise with three EPS12V connections and employs the finest quality components to produce 80 PLUS Platinum efficient power. With three EPS12V ports and completely modular wiring, HXi Series platinum power supplies provide every connection needed to support today's most demanding PC upgrades now and in the future, including the newest generation of power-hungry graphics cards and CPUs. The HXi Series PSUs have a 140mm fluid dynamic bearing fan with Zero RPM mode support for long-lasting fan performance and near-silent operation when the fan shuts off at low and medium loads, only spinning as fast as needed. HXi PSUs are 80 PLUS Platinum certified and use quality 100% Japanese 105°C electrolytic capacitors for outstanding power delivery and long-term dependability with low power consumption, reduced noise, and lower temperatures. CORSAIR iCUE software integrates your whole setup, resulting in a fully immersive ecology with straightforward control. The Corsair HX1500i 1500W 80+ Platinum Full-Modular ATX Power Supply comes with a 10-year warranty.

product_name: ASUS ROG THOR 1600T 1600W 80Plus Titanium Full Modular Power Supply

descriptions.title: ASUS ROG THOR 1600T 1600W 80Plus Titanium Full Modular Power Supply
descriptions.details: The ASUS ROG THOR 1600T is a high-performance power supply designed for extreme gaming and computing setups. It is equipped with top-of-the-line features and premium components to deliver maximum power efficiency, superior cooling, and reduced noise levels. To achieve the prestigious 80 Plus Titanium Certification, the power supply is constructed with 100% Japanese capacitors and other high-quality components. This ensures exceptional power efficiency and reliability, making it an ideal choice for power-hungry systems. The ROG THOR 1600T is known for its ROG heatsinks, which cover critical components and contribute to lower temperatures. By effectively dissipating heat, these heatsinks not only enhance the power supply's performance but also help to minimize operational noise. The power supply is equipped with a 135mm Axial-tech fan that features PWM control. This advanced cooling system not only delivers effective heat dissipation but also operates at reduced noise levels. The fan adjusts its speed according to the thermal demands, keeping the system cool without creating unnecessary noise. The ASUS ROG THOR 1600T features an OLED display, which provides real-time monitoring of power draw. This allows users to keep track of power consumption and ensure that their system is running optimally. The power supply incorporates Gallium nitride (GaN) MOSFETs, which offer improved efficiency and lower switching losses compared to traditional silicon transistors. This enables the ROG THOR 1600T to deliver massive amounts of current while minimizing wasteful energy consumption. To ensure precise control and rapid response to load changes, a digital controller is integrated into the power supply, enabling lightning-fast adjustments to the GaN power array. The PWM-controlled Axial-tech fan is designed to optimize airflow, allowing it to move 21% more air compared to conventional fans. This results in efficient cooling for critical components, even at lower fan speeds. Additionally, when the PSU load is below 50%, the fan automatically shuts off, further reducing noise levels during low-demand scenarios. The ASUS ROG THOR 1600T 1600W 80Plus Titanium Full Modular Power Supply is a top-of-the-line choice for enthusiasts and gamers who demand exceptional performance, efficient power delivery, effective cooling, and reduced noise levels. With its premium components, advanced features, and thoughtful design, it stands as a powerful solution for high-end rigs that require nothing short of the best.

features.Supports: Supports Nvidia GeForce RTX 40 Series GPU

descriptions.title: MSI MEG Ai1300P PCIE5 1300W 80 Plus Platinum Fully Modular Power Supply
descriptions.details: The MSI MEG Ai1300P PCIE5 1300W Power Supply is a cutting-edge solution designed to meet the power demands of high-performance gaming and computing systems. This power supply is engineered to deliver outstanding performance, efficiency, and reliability to ensure your system operates at its best. The MSI MEG Ai1300P features full support for Nvidia GeForce RTX™ 40 Series graphics cards, making it an excellent choice for gamers and content creators looking to harness the power of the latest GPU technology. With ATX 3.0 support, this power supply is compatible with a wide range of motherboards, ensuring seamless integration into your system setup. The PCIe 5.0 readiness and native 16-pin connector guarantee high-speed data transfer and efficient power delivery to the latest PCIe 5.0 compatible devices. This power supply is its software synchronization capability with MSI Center. Through the MSI Center software, you can monitor and control various aspects of your system, including power usage and efficiency, providing an optimized and efficient computing experience. The fully modular design allows for easy cable management, enabling you to use only the cables you need, reducing clutter, and improving airflow within your case. Moreover, the inclusion of sleeve cables adds a touch of style to your build while maintaining a clean and organized appearance. The MSI MEG Ai1300P boasts an 80 PLUS Platinum certification, ensuring that it operates at high-efficiency levels, converting more power from the outlet into usable energy for your components. This not only reduces electricity consumption but also minimizes heat output, leading to quieter and cooler operation. Reliability is a priority, and this power supply delivers 100% Japanese 105°C capacitors and an Active PFC (Power Factor Correction) design, enhancing stability and longevity. Additionally, the power supply features an industrial-level protection system with OVP (Over Voltage Protection), OCP (Over Current Protection), OPP (Over Power Protection), OTP (Over Temperature Protection), SCP (Short Circuit Protection), and UVP (Under Voltage Protection). These protections safeguard your components from potential damage caused by electrical anomalies. The implementation of an LLC Half Bridge Topology with DC-DC module design ensures precise and efficient power delivery to your components, contributing to overall system stability and performance. The MSI MEG Ai1300P PCIE5 1300W 80 Plus Platinum Fully Modular Power Supply is a premium choice for enthusiasts and professionals seeking a reliable and high-performance power solution for their gaming and computing systems. With its top-notch features and advanced technologies, it sets a new standard for power supplies in the market.

descriptions.title: ASUS ROG LOKI SFX-L 1000W 80 Plus Platinum Power Supply
descriptions.details: The ASUS ROG LOKI SFX-L 1000W 80 Plus Platinum Power Supply is a high-performance power supply designed for Intel Form Factor and ATX 3.0 standards. The ASUS ROG LOKI SFX-L 1000W 80 Plus Platinum Power Supply comes equipped with a range of protection features, including OPP/OVP/UVP/SCP/OCP/OTP, ensuring that your system components remain safe from overloading, short-circuits, and other potential hazards. It also meets ROHS standards, making it free from hazardous materials that can harm the environment. This power supply has an AC input range of 100-240Vac and a DC output voltage of +3.3V, +5V, +12V, -12V, and +5Vsb, with a maximum load of 20A, 20A, 62.5A, 0.8A, and 2.5A respectively. The combined load capacity is 110W, 110W, 1000W, 9.6W, and 12.5W. The total output power is 1000W, which is sufficient for most high-end gaming PCs and workstations. The ASUS ROG LOKI SFX-L 1000W 80 Plus Platinum Power Supply comes with a range of connectors, including MB 24/20-pin x 1, CPU 4+4-pin x 2, PCI-E 16-pin x 1, PCI-E 8-pin x 3, SATA x 6, and PERIPHERAL x 4, making it compatible with a wide range of motherboards and other components. descriptions.title: MSI MPG A1000G 1000W 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply
descriptions.details: The MSI MPG A1000G 1000W 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply is a high-quality power supply unit designed to run your Computer components dependably and efficiently. This power supply unit is particularly designed to support the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 30 Series GPUs, ensuring that your gaming or graphic design system functions smoothly and without power problems. The fully modular cable design of the MSI MPG A1000G 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply ensures that you can easily manage and connect cables as needed, while the flat cable equipment allows for easy cable routing and improved airflow within your PC case. The 80 Plus Gold certification of the power supply ensures high efficiency, with up to 90% energy conversion efficiency at 50% load. This translates to less energy wasted as heat, leading to a more cost-effective and eco-friendly system. The MSI MPG A1000G 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply also features 100% all Japanese 105oC capacitors, ensuring long-lasting and stable performance even under heavy loads. The active PFC design further enhances power efficiency by correcting power factors to reduce power loss. This power supply has an industrial-level protection system with OVP (Over Voltage Protection), OCP (Over Current Protection), OPP (Over Power Protection), OTP (Over Temperature Protection), SCP (Short Circuit Protection), and UVP (Under Voltage Protection), ensuring your system is well-protected from any unexpected power-related issues. The power supply's LLC Half Bridge Topology with DC-DC module design ensures stable and reliable power delivery, while also improving efficiency and reducing noise levels. The MSI MPG A1000G 80 Plus Gold Full Modular Power Supply is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a high-quality power supply unit for their PC.
